statements: SELECT * FROM camera_calibration_parameters
SELECT id, focal_length, sensor_width FROM camera_calibration_parameters
SELECT id, sensor_height, radial_distortion_coefficient1, tangential_distortion_coefficient1 FROM camera_calibration_parameters
SELECT * FROM camera_calibration_parameters WHERE focal_length > 50
SELECT id, sensor_height, radial_distortion_coefficient2 FROM camera_calibration_parameters ORDER BY sensor_height DESC
SELECT * FROM camera_calibration_parameters WHERE focal_length > 50 ORDER BY sensor_width DESC;
SELECT id, focal_length, sensor_width, sensor_height FROM camera_calibration_parameters WHERE sensor_height < 20.5;
SELECT id, focal_length, radial_distortion_coefficient1, tangential_distortion_coefficient2 FROM camera_calibration_parameters WHERE radial_distortion_coefficient1 < -0.5 ORDER BY focal_length ASC;
SELECT * FROM camera_calibration_parameters WHERE sensor_height BETWEEN 10 AND 15;
SELECT id, sensor_width, radial_distortion_coefficient1, tangential_distortion_coefficient1 FROM camera_calibration_parameters WHERE focal_length = 35;
SELECT * FROM camera_calibration_parameters;
SELECT id, focal_length FROM camera_calibration_parameters;
SELECT * FROM image_samples WHERE calibration_id = 3;
SELECT image_path FROM image_samples WHERE sample_id = 5;
SELECT id, focal_length, distortion_coefficients FROM camera_calibration_parameters;
SELECT * FROM camera_calibration_parameters;
SELECT id, focal_length FROM camera_calibration_parameters ORDER BY focal_length DESC;
SELECT * FROM camera_calibration_parameters WHERE focal_length > 50 AND distortion_coefficients LIKE '%0%';
SELECT id, focal_length, distortion_coefficients FROM camera_calibration_parameters WHERE id = 3;
SELECT c.id, i.image_path FROM camera_calibration_parameters c INNER JOIN image_samples i ON c.id = i.calibration_id ORDER BY c.id ASC, i.sample_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CameraCalibrationParameters;
SELECT id, camera_model, focal_length FROM CameraCalibrationParameters WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, sensor_size FROM CameraCalibrationParameters WHERE camera_model = 'Nikon';
SELECT * FROM ImageDistortionCorrection ORDER BY distortion_type DESC;
SELECT id, calibration_date FROM CalibratedImages WHERE calibration_quality = 'High';
SELECT * FROM CameraCalibrationParameters WHERE id = 1;
SELECT camera_model, focal_length FROM CameraCalibrationParameters ORDER BY camera_model DESC;
SELECT id, sensor_size FROM CameraCalibrationParameters WHERE focal_length > 50.0;
SELECT * FROM ImageDistortionCorrection WHERE distortion_type IN ('radial', 'tangential') ORDER BY image_id ASC;
SELECT calibration_date, calibration_quality FROM CalibratedImages WHERE calibration_quality = 'high' AND calibration_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM camera_calibrations;
SELECT image_name, resolution_width, resolution_height FROM images WHERE capture_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT calibration_id, camera_model, focal_length FROM camera_calibrations ORDER BY calibration_id DESC;
SELECT image_name FROM images WHERE resolution_width > 1920 AND resolution_height > 1080;
SELECT calibration_id, camera_model, principal_point_x, principal_point_y FROM camera_calibrations WHERE focal_length < 50;
SELECT * FROM camera_calibrations WHERE calibration_id = 1;
SELECT camera_model, focal_length FROM camera_calibrations WHERE principal_point_x > 0;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE resolution_width > 1920 ORDER BY capture_date DESC;
SELECT calibration_id, image_id, distortion_parameters FROM calibration_data WHERE calib_data_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT image_name, resolution_width, resolution_height FROM images WHERE resolution_width < resolution_height;
SELECT * FROM CameraCalibrationParameters;
SELECT id, fx, fy, cx, cy FROM CameraCalibrationParameters ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, model_name FROM DistortionModel WHERE k1 > 0;
SELECT image_id, resolution, timestamp FROM ImageMetadata WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT image_id, correction_timestamp FROM ImageDistortionCorrection ORDER BY correction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM CameraCalibrationParameters WHERE fx > 0.5
SELECT id, model_name, k1 FROM DistortionModel ORDER BY model_name DESC
SELECT image_id, resolution, timestamp FROM ImageMetadata WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM CameraCalibrationData WHERE calibration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT image_id, correction_timestamp FROM ImageDistortionCorrection WHERE correction_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-10-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY image_id ASC
